response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is priced at $1,300,000, reflecting its true worth and the exclusivity it offers. I believe this price is fair and competitive, considering its value to you stands at $1,200,000. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of conducting a transaction that benefits us both.", "product_price": 1300000}
